text: Rotherham United F.C. is a football club which is based in Rotherham, South Yorkshire. It was formed as a merger between Rotherham County and Rotherham Town in 1925. It is in the EFL Championship, the second level of the English football league system.Rotherham history at talkfootball . Talkfootball.co.uk. They have played home matches at the New York Stadium since 2012, having briefly moved to the Don Valley Stadium from their original home at Millmoor in 2008. == Name == * 1877-1905 Thornhill United F.C. * 1905-1925 Rotherham County F.C. * 1925-present Rotherham United F.C. ==References== Category:English football clubs Category:1877 establishments in England
title: Rotherham United F.C.
